name: Scoop Deluxe Beard Balm - 45 grams
description:
This beard balm is handmade right here in Western Australia by a guy named Scott using only the finest natural waxes and oils. 

Apply to your manly face to create a smooth, shiny, fragrant piece of lady bait. This balm is designed to make your beard thick, soft and smell great. Use as often as required.

name: Beard Buddy Beard Wash - 2oz
description:
Our beard wash is a genuine, beard tested and approved grooming product. Beards experience some wear and tear and Beard Buddy Beard Wash is just the thing it needs. It is packed with organic ingredients and essential oils that are tailored to cleanse your beard and the sensitive skin that lives underneath it; keeping it soft and smelling dreamy. Your beard will thank you later.

Directions of use: 
Pop the top and squeeze a small amount of beard wash onto your fingertips. Massage into your face and beard (not your eyes). Rinse and repeat as necessary or until you have washed away the weird.

Ingredients of Beard Wash: 
Aloe barbadensis (Organic Aloe) Juice, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Vegetable Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, and Beard Buddy's super amazing top secret essential oil blend.

Sulfate-free 
Vegan

HANDCRAFTED IN SMALL BATCHES 
IN LOS ANGELES CALIF.

TESTED ON BEARDS 
NOT ANIMALS.

name: Beard Buddy Beard Oil - 0.5oz
description:
Our beard oil is a genuine, beard tested and approved grooming product. Oil for your beard? YES. Your beard is thirsty and Beard Buddy Beard Oil is just the thing it has been searching for. It is packed with natural ingredients & a creamy rich, warm & woodsy scent; perfectly tailored for you & your beard.

Ingredients: 
Grapeseed oil, fractionated coconut oil, vitamin e and Beard Buddy's super amazing blend of top secret essential oils

Directions of use: 
Place a few drops (a little goes a long way) in your beard and massage into hair whilepulling down on it. Use in your morning routine (works extra well after showering) and/or use at night before going out. You may also use beard oil before bed for overnight softening.

HANDCRAFTED IN SMALL BATCHES 
IN LOS ANGELES CALIF.

TESTED ON BEARDS 
NOT ANIMALS.

name: Little Beard's GIFT VOUCHERS
description:
Give them what they really want for Christmas, a Little Beard's Gift Voucher.

Available in $25, $50 and $100 denominations.

Valid for a year from date of purchase.

You will also receive the physical Gift Voucher sent in the post to have and to hold.

name: Hangin' With The Homies AIR FRESHENERS
description:
Eazy motherfuckin E. Previously seen standin' on the corner straight slangin' rocks, the Compton OG can now be found hangin' in your ride.

Scent: Apple 
Size: 90 x 74 mm

Dre, the motherfuckin' Doctor. Unfortunately, we couldn't get this one Chronic-scented, but your Dr. Dre Air Freshener will still have everybody asking Let Me Ride.

Scent: Black Ice 
Size: 98 x 80mm

name: Pigeon and Weasel TRIPLE SCENTED SOY WAX CANDLES
description:
Pigeon loves beer.
Weasel loves candles.
They both love living a low impact urban lifestyle.
The result  - Triple Scented Soy Wax Candles. Hand poured into recycled glass bottles, using paraffin lead free wicks, with unique scents and a distinctive style.


150g Soy Wax Candle â€¢ Approx. 40 hours burning time.

RED FROGS: The bold essence of raspberry will instantly re-ignite happy childhood memories, of eating red lollies!

BLACK LAVENDER: A mesmerizing immersion of freshly cut lavender, into cooling cucumber puree.

CHAI LATTE: The subtly heady aromas of orange zest, cardamom, cinnamon and clove have been captured in a milky infusion, to create our most comforting candle.

CLASSIC VANILLA: We have captured the inviting aromas of vanilla bean, gently folded through fresh, thickened cream.

name: Uppercut Deluxe CONDITIONER
description:
Follow up a shampoo with this conditioning treatment that will restore your hair to its former glory, restoring body to make it more manageable.

Directions for use: For best results, use after Uppercut Shampoo / Bodywash. Remove excess water from hair, massage into hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly.

Size: 250ml.

name: Uppercut Deluxe SHAMPOO
description:
While your lady might argue otherwise, one product is all you need to do the job. The all-in-one shampoo and body wash is laced with peppermint extract for an energising boost and is gentle enough to use daily (yes, you should be showering that frequently).

Directions for use: Apply to wet hair and body, create a rich lather and rinse. Repeat if desired. Suitable for daily use.

Size: 250ml.

name: Uppercut Deluxe MO WAX
description:
A little dab of this stuff will keep your mo ship shape and might even persuade you to sport a mo all year round.

Size: 25ml.

name: Uppercut Deluxe MONSTER HOLD
description: For those who like it real strong we present to you our Monster Hold pomade. Extra powerful, sweat resistant and great for all styles.

name: Uppercut Deluxe MATT CLAY
description:
Uppercut Deluxe Matt Clay makes it easy to achieve a no-fuss messy look. Donâ€™t let the thick consistency fool you, the clay does what you tell it to, effortlessly piecing out hair to give a pliable, re-workable style.

Directions for use: Spread a small amount in dry palms and fingers and work through dry hair, styling as desired.

Size: 70g.

name: Uppercut Deluxe DELUXE POMADE
description:
Uppercut Deluxe Pomade is a water-soluble product suitable for a diverse range of styles but particularly popular with fellas rocking a slickback, quiff or mohawk. Its unique formula means it will wash out easily leaving no residue. The Pomade gives control and definition without the weight of traditional pomades.

Directions for use: Rub a small amount into palms and work through dry hair to style as desired.

Size: 100ml.

name: Jack the Snipper ORIGINAL STYLING CREME
description:
Original Styling Creme is the ultimate Hair Dressing for Men. Whether you wear a quiff, short and textured or dapper, this is the product for you.

A breeze to apply on damp or dry hair, JTS Original Styling Creme can be combed to slick or roughed for texture. Super easy to rinse out and scented with our JTS signature fragrance. Our scent is distinctive and masculine. Woody, sweet, spicy and original.

Every man should have a jar of Original Styling Creme in the bathroom cabinet. With the glossy finish and medium hold of Original Styling Creme, not only will you look groomed and ready for action but youâ€™ll feel like you just strolled out of a 1950â€²s Barber shop.

We recommend the use of JTS Products as part of your daily routine.

Proudly made in Australia.

name: Jack the Snipper HAIRDRESSING FOR MEN
description:
Originally formulated in Australia in the 1930â€²s, JTS Hair Dressing will give you the genuine dapper finish you have been hunting for.

JTS Hair Dressing is light but firm and will set your hair in place. Your style will relax in the later hours for that devilishly handsome, I-donâ€™t-really-care- about-my-hair look.

Proudly made in Australia.
